page.title: 12GREENOCK ARTS GUILD
page.content: GREENOCK ARTS GUILD IS USED FOR MANY PURPOSES. MANY AMATEUR AND PROFESSIONAL ACTORS PERFORM THERE ON A REGULAR BASIS. AT CHRISTMAS THERE IS A PANTOMIME. ANOTHER ANNUAL PRODUCTION IS THE GREENOCK ACADEMY OPERA (USUALLY GILBERT AND SULLIVAN)-THIS YEAR IT WAS THE PIRATES OF PENZANCE. THE GUILD IS ALSO AVAILABLE FOR CLASSES IN DANCE,ELOCUTION,MUSIC AND CHESS. IT IS A MEETING PLACE FOR LOCAL CLUBS AND SOCIETIES. THE BUILDING HAS AN ATTRACTIVE THEATRE WITH STALLS AND A BALCONY. THE REST OF THE BUILDING CONTAINS MANY SMALL ROOMS AND MOST EVENINGS THESE ARE FILLED WITH A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES. THERE IS ALSO A CAFE SELLING TEA, COFFEE, SWEETS AND BISCUITS.
